relation: One of the following: ENG 346 or ENG 347

Two courses in English, or literature courses in Classics, at the 300 level or higher, or literature courses in Foreign Languages and Literatures at the 300 level or higher approved by the student's advisor

One course in English, or literature course in Classics, at the 200 level or higher, or literature course in Foreign Languages and Literatures at the 200 level or higher approved by the student's advisor
One of the following: TH 210 or TH 220
One course in Theatre at any level
One of the following: ENG 489, TH 424, or TH 485
